text: RT @ArielleDRoss: What Causes Green Potato Chips? http://t.co/9Hc4Euy4yQ

paraphrases.text: What is the cause of green potato chips?
Why are there green potato chips?
Why are some potato chips green?

qpairs.question: What causes green-tinged potato chips?
qpairs.answer: The green tinge is caused by excessive exposure to light.
qpairs.simplified_answer: The green colour is caused by excessive exposure to light.
qpairs.summarized_answer: The green colour is caused by excessive exposure to light.

qpairs.question: Green Potato Chips???
qpairs.answer: Green chips come from potatoes that have had too much exposure to light and have built up excess chlorophyll. In case you're wondering, the brown chips you see occasionally in the bags come from potatoes that have been kept in storage so long that the sugar in them has caramelized. It's fine to eat them, green or brown, in small amounts.
qpairs.simplified_answer: Green chips come from potatoes that have had a lot of exposure to light and have built up too much chlorophyll. The brown chips you see sometimes in the bags come from potatoes that have been stored too much, and their sugar has caramelized. It's okay to eat both in small amounts.
qpairs.summarized_answer: Green chips come from potatoes that have had a lot of exposure to light and have built up too much chlorophyll.
